attributes.review:
a complete disaster of an app! it took 4 years to download and it wasn’t worth the wait, let me tell ya. it deleted all my fan accounts of trumpy from social media! not to mention it leaked all my photoshop edits of don as well as all of my private dms with him. i’m devastated.
in short, this app most certainly did NOT make my phone great again. do NOT waste your time here, my fellow trumpy supporters.
attributes.title: sorry trumpy but this app aint it
